dashboards_data.name: HIPAA Compliance Dashboard
dashboards_data.description: Monitor HIPAA controls and produce evidence for audits.

data.phrase:
datamodel 
| filter xdm.observer.product contains "XDR agent" 
| filter xdm.observer.content_version contains "*"
| fields xdm.observer.*
| comp count () as counter by xdm.observer.content_version
| view graph type = column subtype = grouped xaxis = xdm.observer.content_version yaxis = counter

datamodel 
| filter xdm.observer.content_version contains "*" 
| filter xdm.source.agent.version contains "*"
| fields xdm.source.host.hostname, xdm.source.agent.version, xdm.source.host.ipv4_addresses, xdm.source.host.mac_addresses, xdm.source.host.os, xdm.source.agent.content_version, xdm.source.agent.identifier
| comp count () as agent_version by xdm.source.agent.version
| view graph type = pie subtype = full xaxis = xdm.source.agent.version yaxis = agent_version
datamodel | filter xdm.auth.privilege_level contains "*" | fields xdm.auth.* | limit 500

datamodel 
| filter xdm.observer.content_version contains "*" 
| filter xdm.source.host.os contains "*"
| fields xdm.source.host.hostname, xdm.source.host.ipv4_addresses, xdm.source.host.mac_addresses, xdm.source.host.os, xdm.source.host.os_family 
| comp count () as OS_counter by xdm.source.host.os
| view graph type = bubble subtype = packed xaxis = xdm.source.host.os yaxis = OS_counter bubblerad = OS_counter

datamodel 
| filter xdm.observer.content_version contains "*" 
| filter xdm.source.host.os contains "*"
| fields xdm.source.host.hostname, xdm.source.host.ipv4_addresses, xdm.source.host.mac_addresses, xdm.source.host.os, xdm.source.host.os_family

datamodel | filter xdm.observer.product = "XDR agent"
| filter xdm.observer.content_version contains "*"
| dedup xdm.observer.name
| fields xdm.observer.product , xdm.observer.name, xdm.observer.content_version, xdm.observer.type, xdm.observer.unique_identifier, xdm.observer.vendor, xdm.observer.version, _time

datamodel
| filter xdm.network.rule contains "*"
| fields xdm.network.rule, xdm.network.application_protocol, xdm.network.application_protocol_category, xdm.network.http.method, xdm.network.http.response_code, xdm.network.http.url_category, xdm.network.ip_protocol, xdm.network.protocol_layers, xdm.network.session_id

datamodel
| filter xdm.network.rule contains "*" and xdm.network.ip_protocol = "TCP"
| fields xdm.network.rule, xdm.network.application_protocol, xdm.network.application_protocol_category, xdm.network.http.method, xdm.network.http.response_code, xdm.network.http.url_category, xdm.network.ip_protocol, xdm.network.protocol_layers, xdm.network.session_id
| comp count() as network_rule_counter by xdm.network.rule
| view graph type = wordcloud xaxis = xdm.network.rule yaxis = network_rule_counter
datamodel | filter xdm.auth.privilege_level contains "*" | fields xdm.auth.* | limit 500

datamodel 
| filter xdm.observer.product contains "XDR" 
| filter xdm.observer.type = "AGENT_TYPE_REGULAR"
| fields xdm.observer.content_version, xdm.observer.name, xdm.observer.product, xdm.observer.type, xdm.observer.unique_identifier, xdm.observer.vendor, xdm.observer.version

datamodel 
| filter xdm.event.operation contains "REGISTRY" /*Filter for registry events*/
| filter xdm.event.operation contains "*"
| fields _time, xdm.event.type, xdm.event.operation, xdm.event.operation_sub_type, xdm.source.host.hostname, xdm.source.user.username, xdm.source.agent.identifier, xdm.source.process.name, xdm.source.process.executable.path, xdm.event.outcome, xdm.observer.product

datamodel
| filter xdm.network.rule contains "*" and xdm.network.ip_protocol = "TCP"
| fields xdm.network.rule, xdm.network.application_protocol, xdm.network.application_protocol_category, xdm.network.http.method, xdm.network.http.response_code, xdm.network.http.url_category, xdm.network.ip_protocol, xdm.network.protocol_layers, xdm.network.session_id

datamodel 
| filter xdm.event.type contains "*"
| filter xdm.source.host.hostname in ("*")
| fields xdm.source.host.hostname, xdm.source.user.username, xdm.event.operation, xdm.event.operation_sub_type, xdm.source.agent.identifier, xdm.source.process.name, xdm.source.process.executable.path, xdm.observer.product

datamodel 
| filter xdm.auth.kerberos_tgt.encryption_type contains "*"
| fields xdm.auth.kerberos_tgt.encryption_type , xdm.source.host.hostname, xdm.source.ipv4, xdm.source.user.username, xdm.source.port, xdm.target.host.hostname, xdm.target.ipv4, xdm.target.user.username 
| limit 500

datamodel
| filter xdm.network.rule contains "*" 
| fields xdm.network.rule, xdm.network.application_protocol, xdm.network.application_protocol_category, xdm.network.http.method, xdm.network.http.response_code, xdm.network.http.url_category, xdm.network.ip_protocol, xdm.network.protocol_layers, xdm.network.session_id

datamodel | filter xdm.alert.original_alert_id ="kerberos_tgs_req" //krb_tgs_data record description
| filter xdm.auth.kerberos_tgt.cname_type = "PRINCIPAL" and xdm.auth.kerberos_tgt.cname_values contains "*"
| fields xdm.alert.original_alert_id, xdm.auth.kerberos_tgt.cname_type, xdm.auth.kerberos_tgt.cname_values, xdm.auth.kerberos_tgt.encryption_type, xdm.auth.kerberos_tgt.error_code, xdm.auth.kerberos_tgt.kdc_options, xdm.auth.kerberos_tgt.msg_type, xdm.auth.kerberos_tgt.padata_prefix, xdm.auth.kerberos_tgt.spn_type, xdm.auth.kerberos_tgt.spn_values, xdm.auth.kerberos_tgt.ticket_expiration, xdm.auth.kerberos_tgt.ticket_prefix
datamodel | filter xdm.observer.product contains "XDR" | fields xdm.observer.*

widgets_data.title: HIPAA 164.312 (b): Audit controls
widgets_data.description: Implement policies and procedures to audit system activity, Use this widget to query kerberos authentication data.

data.phrase:
datamodel 
| fields xdm.auth.kerberos_tgt.encryption_type , xdm.source.host.hostname, xdm.source.ipv4, xdm.source.user.username, xdm.source.port, xdm.target.host.hostname, xdm.target.ipv4, xdm.target.user.username 
| filter xdm.auth.kerberos_tgt.encryption_type contains "*"
| limit 500

widgets_data.title: HIPAA 164.312 (a) (2): Unique user identification
widgets_data.description: Implement policies and procedures to identify users' access and modifications of ePHI. Use this widget source and event data.

data.phrase:
datamodel 
| fields xdm.source.host.hostname, xdm.source.user.username, xdm.event.operation, xdm.event.type, xdm.event.operation_sub_type, xdm.source.agent.identifier, xdm.source.process.name, xdm.source.process.executable.path, xdm.observer.product 
| filter xdm.event.type contains "*"
| filter xdm.source.host.hostname in ("*")

widgets_data.title: HIPAA 164.312 (e) (1): Transmission security
widgets_data.description: Implement policies and procedures to protect ePHI during transmission. Use this widget to query network rules and monitor transmission security.

data.phrase:
datamodel
| fields xdm.network.rule, xdm.network.application_protocol, xdm.network.application_protocol_category, xdm.network.http.method, xdm.network.http.response_code, xdm.network.http.url_category, xdm.network.ip_protocol, xdm.network.protocol_layers, xdm.network.session_id
| filter xdm.network.rule contains "*"

widgets_data.title: HIPAA 164.312 (d): Person or entity authentication
widgets_data.description: Implement policies and procedures to verify that a person or entity is authorized to access ePHI. Use this widget to query kerberos authentication data.

data.phrase:
datamodel 
| fields xdm.alert.original_alert_id, xdm.auth.kerberos_tgt.cname_type, xdm.auth.kerberos_tgt.cname_values, xdm.auth.kerberos_tgt.encryption_type, xdm.auth.kerberos_tgt.error_code, xdm.auth.kerberos_tgt.kdc_options, xdm.auth.kerberos_tgt.msg_type, xdm.auth.kerberos_tgt.padata_prefix, xdm.auth.kerberos_tgt.spn_type, xdm.auth.kerberos_tgt.spn_values, xdm.auth.kerberos_tgt.ticket_expiration, xdm.auth.kerberos_tgt.ticket_prefix 
| filter xdm.alert.original_alert_id ="kerberos_tgs_req" //krb_tgs_data record description
| filter xdm.auth.kerberos_tgt.cname_type = "PRINCIPAL" and xdm.auth.kerberos_tgt.cname_values contains "*"

widgets_data.title: HIPAA 164.306 (a) (1) : Validate confidentiality and integrity of PHI
widgets_data.description: Implement policies and procedures to protect unauthorized access, alteration, or disclosure of ePHI. Use this widget to track content version.

data.phrase:
datamodel 
| filter xdm.observer.product contains "XDR agent" 
| filter xdm.observer.content_version contains "*"
| fields xdm.observer.*
| comp count () as counter by xdm.observer.content_version
| view graph type = column subtype = grouped xaxis = xdm.observer.content_version yaxis = counter

widgets_data.title: HIPAA 164.306 (a) (2): Threat Protection
widgets_data.description: Develop and implement security policies and procedures. Use this widget to track agent versions.

data.phrase:
datamodel 
| fields xdm.observer.content_version, xdm.source.agent.version
| filter xdm.observer.content_version contains "*" 
| filter xdm.source.agent.version contains "*"
| comp count () as agent_version by xdm.source.agent.version
| view graph type = pie subtype = full xaxis = xdm.source.agent.version yaxis = agent_version

widgets_data.title: HIPAA 164.306 (a) (3): Protect against information disclosure
widgets_data.description: Implement policies and procedures to control and monitor access, unauthorized entry, and ensure security of workstations. Use this widget to query authentication and authorization data.

data.phrase: datamodel | filter xdm.auth.privilege_level contains "*" | fields xdm.auth.* | limit 500

widgets_data.title: HIPAA 164.308 (a) (1) (i) (A): Identify risks and Vulnerabilities
widgets_data.description: Implement policies and procedures to assess potential risks and vulnerabilities. Use this widget to query host data.

data.phrase:
datamodel 
| fields xdm.observer.content_version, xdm.source.host.os
| filter xdm.observer.content_version contains "*" 
| filter xdm.source.host.os contains "*"
| comp count () as OS_counter by xdm.source.host.os
| view graph type = bubble subtype = packed xaxis = xdm.source.host.os yaxis = OS_counter bubblerad = OS_counter

widgets_data.title: HIPAA 164.308 (a) (1) (i) (B): Reduce risks and Vulnerabilities
widgets_data.description: Implement policies and procedures to reduce potential risks and vulnerabilities. Use this widget to query host version data.

data.phrase:
datamodel 
| fields xdm.source.host.hostname, xdm.source.host.ipv4_addresses, xdm.source.host.mac_addresses, xdm.source.host.os, xdm.source.host.os_family, xdm.observer.content_version
| filter xdm.observer.content_version contains "*" 
| filter xdm.source.host.os contains "*"

widgets_data.title: HIPAA 164.308 (a) (1) (i) (C): Apply sanction policy when members fail to comply
widgets_data.description: Implement sanction policies and procedures when workforce members fail to comply with policies or procedures. Use this widget to query agent data.

data.phrase:
datamodel 
| fields xdm.observer.product , xdm.observer.name, xdm.observer.content_version, xdm.observer.type, xdm.observer.unique_identifier, xdm.observer.vendor, xdm.observer.version, _time 
| filter xdm.observer.product = "XDR agent"
| filter xdm.observer.content_version contains "*"
| dedup xdm.observer.name

widgets_data.title: HIPAA 164.308 (a) (6) (i): Identify/respond to known security incidents
widgets_data.description: Implement policies and procedures to identify and respond to security incidents. Use this widget to query network rules.

data.phrase:
datamodel
| fields xdm.network.rule, xdm.network.application_protocol, xdm.network.application_protocol_category, xdm.network.http.method, xdm.network.http.response_code, xdm.network.http.url_category, xdm.network.ip_protocol, xdm.network.protocol_layers, xdm.network.session_id
| filter xdm.network.rule contains "*"

widgets_data.title: HIPAA 164.308 (a) (1) (i) (D): Regularly review audit logs
widgets_data.description: Implement policies and procedures to review system activity. Use this widget to query triggered network rules.

data.phrase:
datamodel
| filter xdm.network.rule contains "*" and xdm.network.ip_protocol = "TCP"
| fields xdm.network.rule
| comp count() as network_rule_counter by xdm.network.rule
| view graph type = wordcloud xaxis = xdm.network.rule yaxis = network_rule_counter

widgets_data.title: HIPAA 164.308 (a) (4) (i) (A): Isolate health care clearinghouse functions
widgets_data.description: Implement policies and procedures to isolate systems that contain ePHI. Use this widget to query authentication and authorization data.

data.phrase: datamodel | filter xdm.auth.privilege_level contains "*" | fields xdm.auth.* | limit 500

widgets_data.title: HIPAA 164.308 (a) (7) (i) (A): Data backup plan
widgets_data.description: Implement policies and procedures to protect and restore ePHI in the event of a disaster or system failure. Use this widget to query observer product data.

data.phrase:
datamodel 
| fields xdm.observer.content_version, xdm.observer.name, xdm.observer.product, xdm.observer.type, xdm.observer.unique_identifier, xdm.observer.vendor, xdm.observer.version 
| filter xdm.observer.product contains "XDR" 
| filter xdm.observer.type = "AGENT_TYPE_REGULAR"

widgets_data.title: HIPAA 164.308 (a) (7) (i) (B): Data recovery plan
widgets_data.description: Implement policies and procedures to recover ePHI in the event of a disaster or system failure. Use this widget to query registry data.

data.phrase:
datamodel 
| fields _time, xdm.event.type, xdm.event.operation, xdm.event.operation_sub_type, xdm.source.host.hostname, xdm.source.user.username, xdm.source.agent.identifier, xdm.source.process.name, xdm.source.process.executable.path, xdm.event.outcome, xdm.observer.product
| filter xdm.event.operation contains "REGISTRY" /*Filter for registry events*/
| filter xdm.event.operation contains "*"

widgets_data.title: HIPAA 164.312 (a) (1): Access control
widgets_data.description: Implement policies and procedures to limit access to ePHI only to authorized individuals or entities. Use this widget to query network rules and monitor access.

data.phrase:
datamodel
| fields xdm.network.rule, xdm.network.application_protocol, xdm.network.application_protocol_category, xdm.network.http.method, xdm.network.http.response_code, xdm.network.http.url_category, xdm.network.ip_protocol, xdm.network.protocol_layers, xdm.network.session_id
| filter xdm.network.rule contains "*" and xdm.network.ip_protocol = "TCP"

widgets_data.title: HIPAA 164.312 (c) (1): Implement policies or procedures to protect PHI
widgets_data.description: Implement policies or procedures to protect ePHI. Use this widget to query observer product data.

data.phrase:
datamodel 
| fields xdm.observer.name, xdm.observer.version, xdm.observer.content_version, xdm.observer.unique_identifier, xdm.observer.product, xdm.observer.type 
| filter xdm.observer.product contains "XDR"
